phrases.phrase: 우산 가지고 가 보는 게 어떻겠니?
meanings: 집을 나올 때 How about taking an umbrella?
집을 나올 때 Why don't you take an umbrella?
병원에 관한 표현 How about going to see a doctor?
병원에 관한 표현 Why don't you go see a doctor?

phrases.phrase: 대형 스크린으로 보는 게 훨씬 더 좋지.
meanings: 극장에서의 표현 It's much better to watch it on the big screen.
(눈으로) see, watch, look (at), catch sight (of), (처음으로) set[lay, clap] eyes (on), (목격하다) spot, witness

meanings.meaning: A picture is worth a thousand words.
two wrongs don't make a right
